fed77285-2179-41e8-9d48-f6486ee24bd6 | lsc = | icon = Icon Bekarna's Observatory.png }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background This isolated fortress is the workplace of Archmage Bekarna, recently taken over by a group of Torn Bannermen under [Carset](/carset/). ## Points of interest * This is a dungeon, more or less. The main hall contains the library and Bekarna's workspace, with several Torn Bannermen scattered all over the place. Carset is in the center, giving out commands. Wiping him out and the rest of his troops will allow you to loot the place with ease. Be sure to grab [The Kingfisher](/theKingfisher/) from the alcove, [The Leviathan](/theLeviathan/) from the upper floor bookcase to the lower left, and [The Huntress](/theHuntress/) from the lower right bookcase. Make sure that you read the items, as just having them in your inventory is not enough to advance the quest. ###### Orrery * The Orrery is where the puzzle can be solved - and where you can face Concelhaut once more, mopping the floor with the proud lich and acquiring his head again. Be sure to grab the gear and [The Panther](/thePanther/) from the desk. ## Characters * [Carset](/carset/), leader of the Bannermen. * [Mimriko](/mimriko/) ###### Orrery * [Concelhaut](/concelhaut/), seemingly back from the... Undeath? * [Aeflyn](/aeflyn/) and [Täog](/taogDeadfire/), elite warriors supporting Concelhaut. ## Loot * [Concelhaut's Skull](/concelhautsSkullDeadfire/), [Effort](/effort/), [Iron-Clasped Grimoire](/ironClaspedGrimoire/): Looted from Concelhaut and his coterie. ## Gallery PE2 Bekarnas Observatory Island.png|Island overview
